mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCTORDER(O_ID,O_DATE,M_ID,O_PAYMENT) values(SEQ_PRODUCTORDER_ID.nextval,sysdate,#{M_ID},#{O_PAYMENT}) SELECT SEQ_PRODUCTORDER_ID.currval FROM dual
insert into ORDERLIST (OL_ID,O_ID,P_ID,cnt) select SEQ_ORDERLIST_ID.nextval, a, b, c from ( SELECT #{test.o_id} as a, #{test.p_id} as b, #{test.cnt} as c FROM DUAL )
mapper.update: update MEMBER set M_GRADE= case when 1000000 < (select sum(p.P_PRICE*o.cnt) total from ORDERLIST o inner join PRODUCT p on o.P_ID = p.P_ID where o.O_ID in (select O_ID from PRODUCTORDER where M_ID=#{value})) then '골드' when 500000 < (select sum(p.P_PRICE*o.cnt) total from ORDERLIST o inner join PRODUCT p on o.P_ID = p.P_ID where o.O_ID in (select O_ID from PRODUCTORDER where M_ID=#{value})) then '실버' else '브론즈' end where M_ID=#{value}
